If you're looking for a game that is best played with friends, then this is the game for you. Currently spent 100hrs+ on this game but still gives me the jumpscare. While this game has been on for quite sometime and had ripoffs, this game is still by far, the best in this genre. 

Another good thing is that the game can be enjoyed without spending extra money. But the DLC's and Skins are so good you'd be wanting to pay more. 

So far, I've seen only two problems in the game. The Party Session/Invite System sucks. Imagine, for every match, you'll have to invite your friends every time before queueing. "EVERY TIME BEFORE YOU ENTER QUEUE". The other one is that matches are P2P which is hosted by the Killer. Meaning, the match is kind of ruined once the killer lags. While you can see your ping before a match starts, some killers intentionally do something on the backend as soon as the match starts that causes the ping to spike. 

While it can be a little boring at somepoint due to repetitiveness especially when played solo, it is seriously fun once in a while when played with friend. 

Bottomline, only buy the game if you'll buy it with your friends unless you are comfortable with playing with strangers.

Очень крутая игра, когда ты играешь за траппера и у тебя в паллетке в трап попадается сурв, за три минуты бага, когда траппер не может сдвинуться с места и поднять сурва, у тебя заводится 2+ генератора, очень классная игра, этот баг как был, так и остался, его не фиксят, зато куча донатского шмота, легиона добавили!!! Всем советую, кому нравится сжигать свой  пердак. Или когда еще лагать начинает у хоста и играть становится невозможно ты не можешь отключиться, тебе дадут минус рейтинг, а играть с тем, что до генератора 10 метров и ты их 6 раз пытаешься преодолеть анриал, спасибо за легиона! Обязательно куплю! Не считая комьюнити еще более убогое, чем в доте, 10 зависших трапперов в палетке из 10!

Хорошая игра. понравился сюжет и то что в этой игре донатные персонажи не вносят дизбаланс. но мне не нравиться то что часто вылетает из игры, долгий поиск за маньяка и не стабильный поиск команды с одним пингом.
Игра крутая советую купить

深渊之人暗处凝视,丧者钟声悠然回响。
电锯之声由远及近,鸣喘哀嚎逐渐清晰。
童谣歌声坠入梦境,摇篮之曲难以入眠。
电击惨笑心智不再,竖锯面罩重重考验。
陷阱静置等待猎物,厄咒加身希望难寻。
绝处境地燃起篝火,迷途羔羊围坐其间。
熬过黑夜即是黎明?毅然赴死便能解脱?
逃生之人不再欣喜,被献祭者放弃挣扎。
终局皆为噩梦一场,无限轮回早已明示:
黑夜之后仍是黑夜,死亡之时绝非解脱。

Since I played 4 hours I wasn't allowed to return this game, at first it was fun.... But it gets boring really fast, the killer is pretty easy to play and the first serveral matches I got at least two survivor kills with two matches getting the whole team, playing as a survivor is not balanced and you get no weapons or anything to defend yourself, yes I get its a procedural survival, but it took more than 2 hours to really see the crappy parts of this game, and truly experience how boring it gets.
If you like lots of various things to do then this game isn't for you, if you like repetitive maps, mediocre game play and you just like leveling a character just to say you did it... This is for you.

I haven't played dbd in a good while, and I'm glad I haven't. I genuinely believe that this game is only successful due to lack of competition. Think of other asymmetrical horror games, and look at how easily they died due to various flaws. No other game of similar genre has been even remotely successful or survived long enough to even try and compete with the long standing title of dbd, so players don't leave. I cannot recommend this game to anyone genuinely, I may eventually come back to the game, but I just want dbd to have real competition so the quality of the game will improve.

This game is clearly unbalanced and lacks decent matchmaking. If you are playing this for the free weekend for the first time...don't even install it. They try to make up for it by giving you 50,000 points to spend right off the bat but with every match played theres another thing that needs nerfed. I understand killers should be overpowered. That's not a complaint here whatsoever.. The game Friday the 13th had the best killer mechanichs in a game so far that ive seen and its a shame that game lost its license. 

Things this game lacks
- Matchmaking. You WILL get matched against a killer that has every perk possible to own...Why? Matchmaking does not exist.
- Proper Balance  There are times where the killer would come after us from across the map when he had no idea we were there. There was a time I was healing a teammate and never missed a skill check yet the killer was right there to get both of us like he knew our exact location. The killer after the match claimed it to be because of a perk he had but if that's a perk to see someone as they are healing a teammate when they have done nothing negative to make the killer aware of their place on the map is ludacris. 
- Dedicated servers. There are times i would see the kiler lag all over the place. I am sure that the killer is the host of the match after all so your ping relies on them. I didn't notice a HUGE affect of this but it's still notable to point out.
- A reporting system that works. This game has been out for a LONG time now so for the fact that it lacks even the most basic of actual reporting is a farcry from how this game should be. Sure they have what looks like a reporting system but you can clearly see just by playing match after match either some killers are using hacks and exploiting the game and they are allowing this to happen. There are times when the killer griefs you and will not allow anyone to get you, slashing your body as it hangs upon the hook. IT DOES NOTHING AS THE KILLER TO DO THIS! but they do as a means to CAMP and not allow anyone to save you. KILLING the game for teams. Who WANTS to let ther teammate die?! nobody. fix it. 

This game would be tons of fun if it was just balanced. It's a clear favorite to have the killers win. Like i said before i get that and understand that is the name of the game but when it feels like the survivors have no chance it really makes you not even try when you get put on the hook. Especially when the killer just stands there and griefs you and watches you die for the entire time you're on the hook. Some people say this is fine and it allows for the team to turn on more generators but the sad truth is that if that happens you end up sacrificing a good majority of the team and if you;re playing as an actual group of 4 on discord it makes it for a very long night of letting teammates die which is not how a killer should be allowed to play.
FUN

Dead by Daylight é um bom jogo com uma ótima mecânica viciante. O problema? A comunidade. É uma das piores comunidades do mundo dos jogos atual, parece que para os jogadores ser tóxico faz parte da gameplay... não preciso nem falar que não é.

Mesmo assim eu recomendo o jogo, é muito divertido para jogar com os amigos e sozinho quando estiver afim de jogar de Assassino.

E no fim, se você for maturo o suficiente você não vai fazer parte dessa podridão de gente tóxica. Conforme passar o tempo você vai é rir das pessoas sendo tóxicas e não mais ficar chateado.

Vejo vocês na Névoa.
BEST GAME EVER!...... Nuff said.

This game is extremely fun, it has great mechanics and pretty decent graphics. They add new DLC content every few months (I only recall once where there was barley anything), and update the game every few weeks. It's a really good game to play for fun, make YouTube videos on, stream, or even have as background gameplay for a comentary. Also, the concept for the game is superb. The two real complaint is that firstly, there are a few bugs here and there that make the game annoying, one I had was when you stabbed you opponent, and the blood on the screen would be png backgrounds, which made me have to reload my game, and secondly,maybe add a free DLC for every 2 or 3 payed ones, other-wise i feel like i have to pay all this money to get more charcters later down the line. But otherwise, it's a superb game.

Final Rating: 8.6/10 - Really good

How I rate stuff: 0-3 Terrible, 4-5 Bad, 6 Okay, 7 Decent, 8-8.5 Good, 8.6-9 Really Good, 9.1+ Amazing
